CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 It was found that the NT - based polymers exhibited distinctly improved photovoltaic performances relative to the BT counterparts , which can be attributed to the enhanced carrier mobility and reduced the band gaps.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NT - based polymers |
| BT counterparts |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "NT - based polymers" and "BT counterparts". These terms are mentioned in the context of comparing their photovoltaic performances.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NT - based polymers |
| BT |

In the revised analysis, the two "Material Name" entities are "NT - based polymers" and "BT". The term "BT counterparts" is not included as it is unclear what material "BT" refers to, and thus it does not clearly refer to a "Material Name".

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 It was found that the NT - based polymers exhibited distinctly improved photovoltaic performances relative to the BT counterparts , which can be attributed to the enhanced carrier mobility and reduced the band gaps.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| distinctly improved photovoltaic performances |
| enhanced carrier mobility |
| reduced band gaps |

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "distinctly improved photovoltaic performances," "enhanced carrier mobility," and "reduced band gaps." These entities represent the properties that were found to be different between the NT-based polymers and the BT counterparts.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| enhanced carrier mobility |
| reduced band gaps |

After reviewing the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, I have removed "distinctly improved photovoltaic performances" because it is not a clear reference to the value of a material property. Instead, it is a description of the relative performance of the NT-based polymers compared to the BT counterparts. The remaining entities, "enhanced carrier mobility" and "reduced band gaps," are clear references to the values of material properties and are presented in the table above.
